column1: Court by which he was first tried was not competent to try the offence with which he is

s can be seen from the afore-stated Section 314, the Order of the discharge of the Appellant from the
further proceedings relating to the first case by the High Court from similar charges in the first trial does
not fall under any of the four limbs in Section 314 of the Code of Criminal Procedure Act No. 15 of 1979.

owever, the argument advanced by the Appellant before us is that he is entitled to be protected from
